mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.oper_order_id AS "operOrder.id", a.pay_type AS "payType", a.price AS "price", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN c_oper_order b ON b.id = a.oper_order_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_oper_order_pay( id, oper_order_id, pay_type, price, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{operOrder.id}, #{payType}, #{price}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_oper_order_pay SET oper_order_id = #{operOrder.id}, pay_type = #{payType}, price = #{price}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
